summary: The Public Service Broadcasting Act, 2081 has been amended to enhance quality and effectiveness of public broadcasting institutions in Nepal. It emphasizes on providing factual information, entertainment, and promoting social and cultural values through competitive democracy. The Act establishes guidelines for the establishment and operation of public broadcasting institutions, ensuring their independence and adherence to legal standards. It also mandates the central office of these institutions to be in Kathmandu, with the option to establish regional offices as needed. The Act aims to uphold national unity, social harmony, and promote national interests through the production and dissemination of news, information, and programs.

summary: The text discusses the Water Regulation Act of Nepal, with amendments made in 2056. It outlines the rules and regulations regarding water management, irrigation, and development projects. The document defines terms related to water usage and infrastructure, as well as the roles and responsibilities of consumer organizations and project committees. It also specifies the authority of the government in water-related projects and the establishment of offices for water management.

परिच्छेद २विश्वविद्यालयको स्थापनाकला, विज्ञान, चिकित्साशास्त्र, कानून, व्यवस्थापन, शिक्षा, विश्वविद्यालयको स्थापना (१३तथा अन्य व्यावसायिक विषयमा   अध्ययन, प्रविधिकअनुसन्धान 7 अध्यपन काम रसमेतको लागि सुदूरपश्चिम विश्वविद्यालय स्थापना गरिएको छत्रिभुवन नेपाल (२ ) यो ऐन प्रारम्भ हुदाका बखत सरकारबाट अनुदान प्राप्त गरीजिल्लाको भीमदत्त विश्वविद्यालयको आङ्गिक क्याम्पसको कञ्चनपुररूपमसञ्चालित सिद्धनाथ विज्ञान भीमदत्तनगर नगरपालिकामा सम्बन्धनक्यम्पस , 7 प्रप्तबहुमुखी क्याम्पस, भीमदत्तनगरलाई संयुक्त रूपमा समावेश गरी सोही परिसरमासद्धनाथगरिनेछ यो विश्वविद्यालयको स्थापनाविश्वविद्यालय   अविच्छिन्न विश्वविद्यालय संस्था   हुने सङ्गठितस्वशासितउत्तराधिकारवाला एक स्वशासित र सङ्गठित संस्था हुनेछविश्वविद्यालयको   सबै काम कारबाहीको निमित्त आफ्नो एउटा छुट्टै(२ छाप%हुनेछविश्वविद्यालयले व्यक्ति अचल सम्पत्ति प्राप्त गर्न उपभोग गर्न (३चल, सरहबेचविखन गर्न वा अन्य किसिमले व्यवस्था गर्न सक्नेछ(४ ) विश्वविद्यालयले व्यक्ति सरह नालिस उजूर गर्न र विश्वविद्यालयउपरसोही नामबाट नालिस उजूर लाग्न सक्नेछकरार गर्न करार बमोजिमको अधिकार प्रयोग विश्वविद्यालयले व्यक्ति सरह (५तथा दायित्व निर्वाह गर्न सक्नेछपरिच्छेद ३विश्वविद्यालयको सङ्गठन तथः पदाधिकारीबमोजिम हुनेछ र यिनीहरूको देहाय विश्वविद्यालयको सङ्गठन विश्वविद्यालयको  सङ्गठन+सामूहिक रूप नै विश्वविद्यालयको स्वरूप हुनेछ(क) सभपरिषद् ला प्रज्ञिककार्यकारी परिषद्सेवा आयोगङ ) संकाय

summary: The text discusses the Sudurpaschim University Act, 2067, which amends various laws related to education in Nepal. It aims to establish a university that focuses on research, teaching, and providing opportunities in various fields to enhance the country's educational and intellectual environment. The Act defines key terms such as "university" and outlines the structure and functions of the university, including the roles of the council, executive board, service commission, research center, academic council, and various academic positions.

summary: The text discusses the regulations related to the operation of cooperative stores selling essential goods in Nepal. The Cooperative Act of Nepal is being used to create rules for the operation of such stores. The regulations cover the definition of essential goods, the establishment of coordination committees, and the operation of cooperative institutions. The regulations also outline the services and facilities that cooperative institutions can provide, including the distribution of essential goods and services to the public.
